# UserTag

import {UserTag} from '@souche-f2e/ruler-tool';

# fetchTags

# 入参

-

# 出参

allTags {
  name
  created
  creator
  appName
}

# 用法

UserTag.fetchTags().then((res) => {
    console.log(res);
});

# addTag

# 入参

{
    userId
    tag
}

# 出参

[{
    name
    created
    creator
    appName
}]

# 用法

UserTag.addTag({userId, tag}).then(res => {
    console.log(res);
});

# deleteTag

# 入参

{
    userId
    tag
}

# 出参

[{
    name
    created
    creator
    appName
}]

# 用法

UserTag.deleteTag({userId, tag}).then(res => {
    console.log(res);
});
